text: Orest Grechka (born 20 December 1975) is a Ukrainian-American former soccer player who is also known to have played for Moss FK of the Norwegian Premier League from 2000 to 2001. ==Norway== He went to Norway after playing for Hannover 96 II in Germany. Completing a two-year deal with Norway's Moss FK in 2000,Orest has signert Moss Fotballklubb Grechka was the first of their new imports to arrive,Orest kommer i morgen! Moss Fotballklubb debuting on the 81st minute in a 1–0 defeat to Brann.MFK tapte i Bergen Moss Avis However, on account of pulling a hamstring muscle shortly after, the forward was left out for 4–6 weeks if his condition retrogressed,Orest ute i 4-6 uker Moss Fotballklubb eventually cancelling his contract in August 2001.Orest Grechka og MFK skiller lag Moss FotballklubbGrechka forlater Moss Vg.no == References == == External links == * Altomfootball.no Profile * Category:Hartwick College alumni Category:American soccer players Category:American expatriate soccer players Category:Association football forwards Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:American people of Ukrainian descent Category:American expatriate soccer players in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:American expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Moss FK players Category:Eliteserien players
title: Orest Grechka
